sections.arabic: اعْلَمْ رَحِمَكَ اللهُ أَنَّهُ يَجِبُ عَلَيْنَا تَعَلُّمُ أَرْبَعِ مَسَائِلَ
sections.english: Know, may Allah have mercy upon you, that it is obligatory upon us to learn four matters.
takeaways: Mercy of Allah upon the student

sections.arabic: الأُولَى: العِلْمُ: وَهُوَ مَعْرِفَةُ اللهِ، وَمَعْرِفَةُ نَبِيِّهِ، وَمَعْرِفَةُ دِينِ الإِسْلَامِ بِالأَدِلَّةِ
sections.english: The First: Knowledge, which is knowledge of Allah, knowledge of His Prophet, and knowledge of the religion of Islam with evidences.
